title: A new MOF-based modified adsorbent for the efficient removal of Hg(II) ions from aqueous media: isotherms and kinetics
content:

Herein, a new MOF-based modified adsorbent for the efficient removal of Hg(II) ions from water media was successfully prepared. This compound has potential as a highly efficacious adsorbent for the discharge of Hg(II) from aquatic media.
